translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達にヒントを与えて通す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gives hints to Rance and his group and lets them pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　戦闘マークはあるが戦闘は発生しない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * There is a battle mark, but no combat occurs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ランス城に居る魔人カミーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the demon Camille in Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 牢屋部屋、魔人カミーラが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The prison room where demon Camille is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラはランス達に道を開ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camille clears the way for Rance and his group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Opens the way using a feigned illness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここから恐瘴気が発生
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fearful miasma starts to emanate from here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスが居る事を確信
牢番アバシリが立ち塞がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The prison guard Abashiri stands in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捕らわれていた美樹を解放

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Time runs out resulting in a draw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒せと道を開ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Opens the way, saying to defeat Cavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに恐瘴気が強くなる
その頃、ケイブリスの部屋
さらに恐瘴気が強くなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fearful miasma intensifies even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリス回想
魔人ケイブリスと接触
ランス達は下水道に落ちる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others fall into the sewer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは、部下達を呼び寄せ叱る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebris calls his subordinates and scolds them.
Rance and the others who fell into the hole.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャングリラに帰るというシャリエラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaliera says she will return to Shangri-La.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスをぶっ殺すと決めるランス
ケイブワンニャンが合流
ケイブニャンが仲間に加わる

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gives the key to the treasury.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タロコンソードを発見
さらにタロコン機関を発見
サンセット号のメンバーが合流
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Members of the Sunset join the group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケイブリスの部屋

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Skeleton King and Defense Captain die.
There is a rotten mud princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の台詞、燃え、感電、凍えのどれかになった時（どれでも対応出来る会話で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During battle lines, when one of burn, electric shock, or freezing occurs (dialogue that can handle any of these).

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
